ARABIC: ءَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بَنَىٰهَا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Are you stronger in structure or is heaven? He built it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Are you more difficult to create or the heavens? He built it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Is it harder to create you or the heaven? But Allah built it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (People), is your creation harder for God than that of the heavens, which He created, raised and established
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Do you think that it is harder to create you or the heavens? Allah has created it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Are you more difficult to create or is the heaven that He constructed
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Are you the harder to create or the heaven? He made it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What, are you stronger in constitution or the heaven He built?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Are ye the harder to create, or is the heaven that He built?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [O Men!] Are you more difficult to create than the heaven which He has built,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Are ye harder to create or the heaven which He hath builded?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Is your creation more prodigious or that of the heaven He has built?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: What! Are ye the more difficult to create or the heaven (above)? (Allah) hath constructed it:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Are you more difficult to create, or is the heaven that He constructed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What, are you harder to create than the heaven which He has built?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Are you more difficult to create, or the heaven? He constructed it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? Allah constructed it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:27] Are you (read a-antum pronouncing both hamzas, or by substituting an alif for the second one, not pronouncing it and inserting an alif between the one not pronounced and the former, or without [this insertion]), namely, [you] the deniers of the Resurrection, harder to create or the heaven which He has built?, harder to create (banāhā: an explication of the manner of [its] creation).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Are ye) people of Mecca (the harder to create) harder to resurrect and more perfect in your creation, (or is the heaven that He built?
